alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Paulding; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Defiance, central Paulding and northwestern Van Wert Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a broken line of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bryan to near Monroe. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of central Defiance, central Paulding and northwestern Van Wert Counties, including the following locations... Mcgill, Haviland, Worstville, Ney, Latty, Mark Center, Tipton, Briceton, Cecil and Broughton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northwestern and west central Ohio.
